text: Samsung please roll out one ui 7 in s24 ultra. If it is late ,open the window for beta to the new users. Don't take only limited users in beta program.

They don't care about us, they treat us like dirt. A company that doesn't respect or appreciate its customers at all. Rather, it follows a policy of trade and profit and pushes them to buy its new devices only. As a Samsung 24Ultra user, I feel betrayed. Im living to google pixel
我看到大家都在用母语骂，那我就不翻译了，三星的妈妈就是死掉了，这些韩国棒子一个个都掉到钱眼里面去了，就是明确的知道S25相比S24没有任何升级，所以要生硬的制造卖点，OneUI7给独占个几个月，建议卢泰文的母亲在下葬的时候坟墓也独占几个月，真司马东西，不想想这样能丢失多少老用户。
